# Production dependency input file (no hashes). Generated/maintained manually.
# Lock file: requirements-hashed.txt (generated by pip-compile).
# Update process:
#   1. Edit versions here.
#   2. Run: pip-compile --generate-hashes --output-file requirements-hashed.txt requirements.txt
#   3. Commit both files.
#
# To regenerate the lock file locally:
#   pip install pip-tools
#   pip-compile --generate-hashes --output-file requirements-hashed.txt requirements.txt

# Web server framework (optional - for API server)
fastapi==0.115.0
uvicorn==0.38.0
# Note: sse-starlette was removed due to incompatible starlette version requirements
# with fastapi 0.115.0. sse-starlette 2.2.1 requires starlette>=0.41.3, but 
# fastapi 0.115.0 requires starlette>=0.37.2,<0.39.0. SSE functionality is not
# currently used in the codebase.

# Data validation and serialization
pydantic==2.12.3
pydantic-core==2.41.4
typing-extensions==4.15.0
dataclasses-json==0.6.7

# Scientific computing and data processing
numpy==1.26.4
pandas==2.3.3

# Configuration and data formats
PyYAML==6.0.3

# Security
cryptography==41.0.7
defusedxml==0.7.1

# Transitive/supporting (explicitly pinned to keep lock stable)
annotated-types==0.7.0
marshmallow==3.26.1
typing-inspect==0.9.0
typing-inspection==0.4.2
mypy-extensions==1.1.0
python-dateutil==2.9.0.post0
pytz==2024.2
tzdata==2025.2
# Pin starlette to the range fastapi 0.115.0 supports for reproducibility
starlette>=0.37.2,<0.39.0

# Optional LangChain integration (uncomment if needed; then re-run pip-compile)
# langchain>=0.1.0
# langchain-core>=0.1.0

# Optional performance dependencies (uncomment if needed; then re-run pip-compile)
# redis==4.0.0
# psycopg2-binary==2.9.0
# elasticsearch==8.0.0
# numba==0.56.0
# torch==2.0.0
